name.ja: <ruby>魔<rt>ま</rt></ruby><ruby>界<rt>かい</rt></ruby><ruby>劇<rt>げき</rt></ruby><ruby>団<rt>だん</rt></ruby>のゲネプロ

text.en: At the start of your Main Phase 1: Add 1 "Abyss Actor" card and 1 "Abyss Script" Spell from your Deck to your hand, also you cannot Pendulum Summon monsters for the rest of this turn after this card resolves, except "Abyss Actor" monsters.
